text: Dear Pastor Bi Yun, we can't thank you enough for all your visits during our mom's hospitalisation and your role at my mom's funeral. As a family, we were comforted by your prayer and kind words. You've helped us remember that even though she's gone, her angel is always watching over us. We also thank all members' visits from Renewal Christian Church. Our family felt so blessed by you and all your team members during the last few weeks. Thank you and God Bless!!
Went there twice. Warm, welcoming and friendly charismatic mandarin service. Have a heart for God and living out his life spiritually.
Worshipping here is like time spent among family. I have been here over 20 years and I have always felt warmly welcomed.
Worship is authentic and impactful, great and comfortable place, warm community and genuine members that truly care for one another!
A very homely environment with passionate Jesus-lovers who would run many extra miles to love the people placed in their lives.
